definitions.body: c. art. = subst. the Egyptian Ge 39:2, Ge 39:5, Ex 2:12, Ex 2:14, 2Sa 23:30, 2Sa 23:30, 1Ch 11:23, 1Ch 11:23; so once without art. [[מִחְרִי]] De 23:8; [[הַמִּחְרִי]] once (late) coll.= the Egyptians Ezr 9:1 (where with Canaanitish peoples); pl. = the Egyptians, [[הַמִּחְרִים]] Ge 12:12, Ge 12:14, Ge 43:22, De 26:6, Jos 24:7; fs. [[הָגׇּר הַמִּחְרִית]] Hagar the Egyptian woman Ge 16:3, Ge 21:9, Ge 25:12.
